questions.question: Have you hurt your head in the last 7 days?
Have you fainted or blacked out in the last 24 hours?
answers: I'm not sure or it was more than 24 hours ago

questions.question: Do you feel so ill that you can't think of anything else?
questions.help: For example, you feel worse than you've ever felt in your life and you have a feeling that something is very wrong.
answers: I'm not sure I feel that ill

questions.question: Do you have a new rash all over your body that won't turn white or won't go away when you press a glass on it?
questions.help: This rash can be a sign of meningitis. The rash may be red-blue, purple, brown, pin prick size or larger blotches or blood blisters. On darker skin, check the paler areas like palms or soles.
answers: Yes - the rash doesn't go away under the glass
I'm not sure I feel that ill

questions.question: Have you had any new symptoms of a stroke, even if they've gone away?
questions.help: This rash can be a sign of meningitis. The rash may be red-blue, purple, brown, pin prick size or larger blotches or blood blisters. On darker skin, check the paler areas like palms or soles.
answers: Your face has suddenly fallen on one side
You suddenly can't lift your arms up or keep them up
You have problems speaking, understanding or are slurring your words

questions.question: Have you got an agonising headache, right now, like you were suddenly hit with something hard?
questions.help: This is a headache that came on in seconds like a thunder clap, if it's any other type of headache answer no.
